about_the_game:
Shadow Project is a narrative-focused, tactical FPS that takes place during the heightened tensions of the Cold War between the Soviet Union and the United States. Your goal is simple, but achieving it will not be. You must infiltrate Soviet territory and put a stop to their recently discovered experiments, which have subjected all forms of life to a series of tortuous and inhuman trials.

Blood Must Spill 

Set in the late 1980s, you are part of a team that is tasked with taking down a series of Soviet military installations that are suspected of being involved with these trials, referred to as Shadow Project by US intelligence. Rumors have circulated describing large-scale unethical human experimentation for several years, but were recently given confirmation from a Soviet defector, who has exposed the horrible truth of Shadow Project. 

Immersive Gameplay 

Experience heart-racing gameplay in carefully crafted environments tailored to an immersive sim design. Explore every corner of every location for supplies as you face seemingly impossible odds. Find different ways to fight, sneak by, or find a secret shortcut. The choice is yours.

content_descriptors.notes: Shadow Project contains content not appropriate for all ages or not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
